event.title: Clock
event.name: Cycles
event.description: The number of core clock cycles

event.title: Exception
event.name: Return
event.description: Instruction architecturally executed, condition code check pass, exception return

event.title: Instruction
event.name: CONTEXTIDR
event.description: Instruction architecturally executed, condition code check pass, write to CONTEXTIDR

event.title: Branch
event.name: PC change
event.description: Instruction architecturally executed, condition check pass, software change of the PC

event.title: Procedure
event.name: Return
event.description: Instruction architecturally executed, condition code check pass, procedure return

event.title: Branch
event.name: Mispredicted
event.description: Mispredicted or not predicted branch speculatively executed

event.title: Memory
event.name: Translation table
event.description: Instruction architecturally executed (condition check pass) - Write to TTBR

event.title: Counter chain
event.name: Odd Performance
event.description: For odd-numbered counters, increments the count by one for each overflow of the preceding even-numbered counter. For even-numbered counters there is no increment.

event.title: Cache
event.name: L2 data clean
event.description: L2 data cache write-back, cleaning and coherency

event.title: Bus
event.name: Access not shared
event.description: Bus access, not Normal, Cacheable, or Shareable

event.title: Intrinsic
event.name: LDREX
event.description: Exclusive operation speculatively executed, LDREX, or LDX

event.title: Intrinsic
event.name: STREX fail
event.description: Exclusive operation speculatively executed, STREX, or STX fail

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Load/Store
event.description: Operation speculatively executed, load or store

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Integer
event.description: Operation speculatively executed, integer data processing

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Advanced SIMD
event.description: Operation speculatively executed, Advanced SIMD instruction

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Stalled Linefill
event.description: A linefill caused an instruction side stall

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Stalled Page Table Walk
event.description: A translation table walk caused an instruction side stall

event.title: Cache
event.name: Tag Ways
event.description: Number of ways read in the instruction cache - Tag RAM

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data Ways
event.description: Number of ways read in the instruction cache - Data RAM

event.title: Cache
event.name: BATC Read
event.description: Number of ways read in the instruction BTAC RAM

event.title: Slots
event.name: Load-Store Unit
event.description: Duration for which all slots in the Load-Store Unit are busy

event.title: Slots
event.name: Load-Store Issue Queue
event.description: Duration for which all slots in the load-store issue queue are busy

event.title: Slots
event.name: Data Processing Issue Queue
event.description: Duration for which all slots in the data processing issue queue are busy

event.title: Slots
event.name: Data Engine Issue Queue
event.description: Duration for which all slots in the Data Engine issue queue are busy

event.title: MMU
event.name: Table Walk
event.description: Duration of a translation table walk handled by the MMU

event.title: MMU
event.name: Stage1 Table Walk
event.description: Duration of a Stage 1 translation table walk handled by the MMU

event.title: MMU
event.name: Stage2 Table Walk
event.description: Duration of a Stage 2 translation table walk handled by the MMU

event.title: MMU
event.name: LSU Table Walk
event.description: Duration of a translation table walk requested by the LSU

event.title: MMU
event.name: Instruction Table Walk
event.description: Duration of a translation table walk requested by the Instruction Side

event.title: MMU
event.name: Preload Table Walk
event.description: Duration of a translation table walk requested by a Preload instruction or Prefetch request

event.title: MMU
event.name: cp15 Table Walk
event.description: Duration of a translation table walk requested by a CP15 operation (maintenance by MVA and VA to PA operations)

event.title: Cache
event.name: VIPT hit
event.description: Data cache hit in itself due to VIPT aliasing
